overview: An ex-soldier travels to an unknown land to hunt down the person who murdered a revered general of his. But while he waits to catch the culprit, the unexpected beauty of life and those who have burst into it distract him. He meets Miho, a lonely foreign student working as a prostitute. Intertwined is also Carlos, a recently paralyzed student trying to cope with new found disability.
tagline: In a world of love, hate, and struggle is a discovery of strength and self-perseverance
title: Broken Wings
